    • elementActionsType

      @When("I Type {string} into the element found by {locatorType}: {string}") public void elementActionsType​(java.lang.String text, com.shaft.cucumber.ElementSteps.LocatorType locatorType, java.lang.String locatorValue)
      Checks if there is any text in an element, clears it, then types the required string into the target element.
      Parameters:
      text - the target text that needs to be typed into the target webElement

      locatorValue -

    • elementActionsKeyPress

      @When("I Press the {word} key into the element found by {locatorType}: {string}") public void elementActionsKeyPress​(java.lang.String key, com.shaft.cucumber.ElementSteps.LocatorType locatorType, java.lang.String locatorValue)
      Sends a keypress to the target element. Supported keys are: ENTER, RETURN, TAB.
      Parameters:
      key - the key that should be pressed
      locatorType -
      locatorValue -

    • assertElementAttribute

      Asserts webElement attribute equals expectedValue.
      Parameters:
      elementAttribute - the desired attribute of the webElement under test
      locatorType -
      locatorValue -
      expectedValue - the expected value (test data) of this assertion
